task.title: Change Room
task.shortdesc: You can change guest room with any free/vacant room. If the guest had made outbound calls or consumed mini bar items in the previous room, the system will automatically add the charges into the bill.

context.note: A guest can move room only once.

step.cmd: Go to Hotel Room Operations Room List , select the guest, click Move.
Select a desired room from the drop down menu of Move to Room.
Input Extra Charges if the guest has damaged things in the room or others.
Make a note of extra charges information or why the guest would change room in the Notes field.

info.p: The guest will be moved to the selected room.
